text: The Mainz University of Applied Sciences (German: Hochschule Mainz), is a Hochschule (university of applied sciences). It was founded in 1971. ==List of departments== * Technology * Design * Business Studies (applied Economy studies) == Other websites == * Official Website Category:1971 establishments in Germany Mainz, Fachhochschule Category:Mainz
title: Fachhochschule Mainz
